text: kya samay nahin aaya eemaan vaalon ke lie ki jhuk jaayen unake dil allaah ke smaran (yaad) ke lie tatha jo utara hai saty aur na ho jaayen unake samaan, jinhen pradaan kee gayeen pustaken isase poorv, phir lambee avadhi vyateet ho gayee unapar, to kathor ho gaye unake dil[1] tatha unamen adhiktar avagyaakaaree hain
